title: "Virat Kohli says ‘self belief’ and ‘resilience’ driving forces behind his achievements"
excerpt: "“This self-belief helps me stay positive and focused on improving my game… I draw inspiration from my past successes and learnings. Reflecting on the moments when I performed at my best and analysing the areas where I can improve from losses, helps me grow as a player. Every setback becomes an opportunity for me to come back stronger,” he added."
